RESOURCE.NAME: AlchemyAPI: Entity Extraction
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Runs the AlchemyAPI Entity Extraction service on a GATE document

PARAMETER.NAME: numberOfSentencesInBatch
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Number of sentences to be sent to Alchemy API to process in one batch

PARAMETER.NAME: numberOfSentencesInContext
PARAMETER.COMMENT: This is the number of sentences that are used as sentences in context both on left and right side and not annotated when sent as part of a less there are no more sentences to be considered as part of the context

PARAMETER.NAME: apiKey
PARAMETER.COMMENT: developer key. One has to obtain this from Alchemy API by creating an account online

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process

RESOURCE.NAME: AlchemyAPI: Keyword Extraction
RESOURCE.COMMENT: Runs the AlchemyAPI Keyword Extraction service on a GATE document

PARAMETER.COMMENT: Number of sentences to be sent to Alchemy API to process in one batch

PARAMETER.NAME: numberOfSentencesInContext
PARAMETER.COMMENT: This is the number of sentences that are used as sentences in context both on left and right side and not annotated when sent as part of a less there are no more sentences to be considered as part of the context

PARAMETER.NAME: apiKey
PARAMETER.COMMENT: developer key. One has to obtain this from Alchemy API by creating an account online

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process
